channel.title: Why are costume items not working? 317 plz help
channel.description: i downloaded a bunch of 317 costumes but when i compile and log in after i added the Int into class 8.java and get the item it turns out to be some type of glitched thing like when i wear it its a tree(i wearing a tree), and the outcome is always different for the other customs. please help. the source is pk planet and it is a 317 server please help me fix this problem.
